attributes.action: Allow Police Officers to use blue lights on their vehicle when on duty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please allow police officers to use a blue lightbar and sirens) on their personal vehicle while on duty.

Although Police Officers are already allowed to drive police vehicles, by allowing them to respond to an emergency in their own vehicle, the officer will be familer with the controls and the handling of the car, but will also allow them to respond to emergencys should their be no other vehicles available at the time.
